framework.title: Peace & Conflict Resolution Framework
framework.subtitle: Building Sustainable Peace through Values-Based Transformation
framework.description: Transform conflicts into opportunities for regenerative relationships through values-based mediation, Indigenous wisdom, and coordinated global action.
keyFeatures: Values-based conflict transformation using Spiral Dynamics
Indigenous sovereignty and Traditional Knowledge integration
Four-part structure: Foundations → Operations → Implementation → Deployment
Golden Triangle integration with Treaty, Indigenous, and Meta-Governance frameworks
Scale-specific applications from local to global conflicts
Truth and reconciliation processes led by spiritual wisdom

valuesBasedTransformation.title: Values-Based Transformation
valuesBasedTransformation.description: Revolutionary approach that addresses clashing values at the root of conflicts rather than just competing interests

goldenTriangleIntegration.title: Golden Triangle Integration
goldenTriangleIntegration.description: Seamless coordination with Treaty mechanisms, Indigenous wisdom, and Meta-Governance systems

regenerativePeace.title: Regenerative Peace
regenerativePeace.description: Transforms conflict systems that perpetuate violence into peace infrastructure that generates healing and cooperation

culturalAdaptation.title: Cultural Adaptation
culturalAdaptation.description: Region-specific frameworks co-created with local practitioners using Ubuntu, Sulh, Dharma, and Indigenous knowledge

fourPartStructure.implementation: System integration, technology deployment, and professional development
fourPartStructure.deployment: Strategic roadmap, measurement, risk management, and sustainability
